column1: I use this product every night after I take my shower. It has a nice mild fragrance and absorb easily by the skin. Results can be seen and felt after a few applications. Excellent result, highly recommend this product for restoring your radiant and beautiful, and healthy looking skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I never ever bough myself a night cream but after trying this Klassikko Night cream .. let just say how amazing my face felt when I use this product it was amazing .. fresh feeling the way I left like cleaning my face. I never ever felt so great in my face . I already bought another cream cuz that how much I been using it at night & because I have my friends sleep over couple night and did girl relax day . [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have just started using it. It has an amazing light smell. I don't need to use a lot. A little goes a long way. It makes my skin feel hydrated and soft. It's amazing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried the Klassikko Restoring Night Cream for two weeks at night before bed. I liked the texture and the smell. I saw some results in I didn't look as tired, and my face looked brighter and more youthful. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I use this every night after I wash my face. I love the feel of the product and how it absorbs into my skin. It's not too heavy, yet still moisturizes and leaves my skin feeling soft and looking it's best when I wake up. I haven't used it long enough to speak on it's long term advantages or effects but from my experience with this night cream I'd certainly recommend it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Omg I love this stuff ❤️ Smells amazing and makes my face feel so soft. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Im a guy and haven't paid attention to facial moisturizing until my 30s. I live in a very dry climate and started using this recently to care for my sun abused face. The scent is light and a little bit goes a long way. No crazy results on the lines in my face but my skin definitely looks and feels moisturized and healthy. This is also at a very good price point for the quality. Will be a repeat buyer.

I've used the whole bottle now and I have to say this night cream has made my skin so smooth and soft. I was afraid to try this because of my sensitive skin, but I haven't broken out. This cream has left my skin so soft and moisturized. I would recommend to anyone who has sensitive and dry skin. The best part is the smell. It's a clean refreshing smell. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This cream smells wonderful and feels nice on the skin. It absorbs quickly and doesn't make my skin feel oily. I have not noticed much of a difference with fine lines, but it feels good and is gentle on my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Used this product every day for the past 30 days and it works great. No terrible smell, no oily residue, I didn't break out and my wrinkles were reduced. Can't wait to see what the next 30 days holds in store for me! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The night cream does a good job of keeping the skin hydrated compared to others within the same price range. It has negligible smell (I am very sensitive to any kind of smell in my cosmetics) and doesn't feel greasy on the skin after the first few mins of application [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This night cream is super rich. It feels so luxurious when applying. It is a bit thicker so maybe good for people with dry skin, perfect in winter. It absorbs fairly well and doesn't leave a heavy greasy feel, but it is still kind of silky on top. I hadn't heard of this brand before but would definitely recommend it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I use this product more as a general moisturizer than a night cream. I like it's thick consistency, but light feel. The scent is pleasant, and I'm usual very sensitive to scented products. I also have very sensitive skin and usually use unscented and very simple lotions. This was a fun switch up and worked well. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Klassikko Restoring night cream worked amazingly. It worked 100% better than other creams I have tried. I would definitely buy this product! I wasn't aware of this product before participating but I am very glad I did. My skin has improved and is no longer dry. The cream is very smooth and makes your skin so soft without greasy residue. I highly recommend this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I had heard the brand before but had never tried it. I'm so glad I have now had the chance. This product left my face feeling incredibly soft throughout the night into the next morning. I'd for sure buy this again. It's better than other leading brands in my opinion. I definitely recommend it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer goes on thick and absorbs quickly, leaving a light feel. It helped my chapped nose and skin bounce back from the abuse of a bad cold, and has been very helpful in the dry weather. I do prefer unscented products and am sensitive to strong scents, but this had a very light scent that did not bother me or longer too long. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is awesome and made my skin feel so soft! It absorbs really fast and doesn't leave a heavy feeling after. This is better than a lot of other night creams I've used because I like how it doesn't feel heavy on my skin. I really like the smell of it too. I have recommended it to a few people already! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been looking for a product that worked and was also more natural than other products. Enter Klassikko Restoring Night Cream. It is just thick enough for amazing moisturizing withiut that greasy sticky feeling on my face. I can see results in a instance and then over time as well My skin is brighter, redness has been reduced and I am LOVING this cream. As an added extra it has a light clean scent that is perfect for bedtime. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using this product for almost 2 weeks now and I wake up with super soft skin. The scent is subtle and floral. I love the consistency as it is thick and easily spreadable. I love the change my face has after this nightly routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used the product every evening for about 3 weeks. I have noticed that my face is softer and has not cause me any breakouts. If you're sensitive to smell it may be a bit much for you but I like the smell and it does not bother me at all or linger for a long time. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Lumene Klassikko Restoring Night Cream is great at making your face feel moisturized and fresh. I use this right after my shower and washing my face. It immediately goes on easily and smoothly. The smell is fresh and light. I don't feel oily afterwards either. I love this cream! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Love this night cream. Really hydrates and restores my skin it felt a little heavy at first but it you rub it in really good that feel goes away and it makes my face feel so good . Doesn't clog it or make it feel weird, takes away my dry spots and dullness absolutely love it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using this product for 3 weeks so far and I absolutely love the way it feels on my skin. It's not greasy like other brands I've used in the past. I would buy this product again. I never even heard of this brand before. I would definitely recommend to others with sensitive skin. There is a scent but it's not over powering and it smells fresh and clean. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I use this every night after i wash my face. My face feels absolutely amazing after each use. My skin is silky smooth and my wrinkles and dark age spots are going away!! Love this product wish i could give 10 stars [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This cream is fabulous!! I'd never tried or even heard of this brand before, but I think I found a new favorite! It makes my skin feel SO soft, and the scent is incredible! It doesn't take much either, so even though it has a higher price point, it lasts a while! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I always have fine lines and dark circles from lack of sleep over the years. Just adding this into my routine seemed to bright and hydrate my face skin very well. It did not cause me any skin irritations either which I was very very pleased with! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using Klassico Restoring night cream for a little over a week. The night cream smells good and is a good moisturizer, but I have not noticed any restoration in my skin. I will continue to use it and maybe I will notice a change. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using this for just over a week and no blemishes yet. I have sensitive skin that easily reddens or breaks out in little rashes or pimples. I have not had any of that! I love the clean scent, minimal but fresh. The texture is great. Great day cream, my mineral make up does not cake in it either. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This cream is thick, but not greasy. It smooths on easily and absorbs into the skin quickly. I felt the hydration almost immediately. After using it for a week, dry patches were smooth and my skin looked and felt smoother. This is an excellent night cream. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I live in Michigan and we have been suffering through some intensely cold winter days with subzero temperatures. My skin and face are so dried out and this night cream came to the rescue. I typically have problem with breakouts but this did not cause any inflammation of my skin. I would also use it around some really dry patches of skin on my face and neck during the day as well. And it smells awesome, kind of flowery but in a really good way. Will buy again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product smells great and is not greasy however it did make me break out initially. I have not noticed any amazing results however my skin is less dry in the morning which is a huge plus in the winter. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After washing my face in the evening I apply the night cream to my clean skin. When I wake up in the morning my skin looks refreshed and feels smooth. The fine lines are plumped and almost non existent. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product in exchange for my honest review. I have really dry and sensitive skin so I was really excited about trying this product in hopes it could help. It is Amazing! It has a lovely rose fragrance. You do not need a lot I put the lotion on my face and neck. It goes on smoothly and when I wake in the morning my face feels and looks refreshed and smooth. My skin has never felt so great before! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

When applying I noticed a bit of a greasy feeling, and the smell of the product was not the best, however it made my face feel soft. If there is a different scent, I would buy it again. I am just sensitive to smells. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This restoring night cream is really nice and thick and has a great scent and feel to it!! I had never heard of it when I tried it, but it is worth checking out!! I would recommend it for sure!! I have pretty dry skin and this seems to keep my skin feeling good!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is amazing in that it is so creamy and moisturizing but in a way that is fully absorbed and not greasy on your skin. It has a light clean smell and adding it to my skin care routine has made my skin brighter and softer than ever! Great stuff! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I put this on before bed. It has a nice light almost flowery but not quite smell. My face is definitely feeling restored. Its a nice thick cream so it only takes a drop and none gets wasted.It is a tad oily feeling but is absorbed fairly quickly and has not caused breakouts for me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

First an foremost, I'm kind of upset they're sourcing water from natural springs in the Artic. Just leave the artic alone... When I put it on my face felt really good. Hydrated and soft, but not so much in the morning. My face was soft, but dry. On a good note, it smells absolutely amazing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Klassikkomrestoring night cream works amazing! It restores moisture to your face. In the winter my face gets dry and this cream has worked amazing! I will be buying more and the other products that go with the night cream! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used this product at night time and i love it smells really good has a light smell and makes your face feel really smooth... It says use at night nut i used it in the day time to i also applied it to my neck... I highly recommend this product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer is gentler and less greasy than other moisturizers that I've used. It is thicker in consistency. I would buy it again especially at just under $10. I was not aware of this product until i participated in the program. I would recommend this product to others especially if they have sensitive skin or are looking for a more gentle product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I've used this a few times now and I really like the way my fave feels after. It always feels smooth and soft. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
So I've been useing this about 2 1/2 week and I'm in love! It's so light weight, goes on smooth, smells fresh! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I started using this and it changed my skin from dry to smooth and firm. i apply it at least every night. and its effective, and doesnt leave your face greasy. i would recommend [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am over 50, so I am really seeing the fine lines and my skin is so dry. I use this in the morning and at night and my skin feels as smooth as silk, and looks amazing. I will tell all my friends! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like the creamy texture of it. It helps moisture my skin during cold and dry weather past weeks. I like the minimal scent it has. It applies well and even on the skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I really loved it.. its super creamy but not greasy.. makes my skin super soft and smooth..this is an awesome product for your skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the way this cream has restored my face. I wake up with smooth skin. The cream is the perfect thickness and texture. It is easy to rub into skin and does not leave a greasy feeling. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Amazing product, I used this after I had my toner and it really feels clean and fresh before I sleep. The creamy and the scent last. I would surely recommend this. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
used klassikko restoring night cream at bedtime and loved the results. made my skin very soft without feeling oily. the scent is very nice also. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product smells amazing easy to apply to the skin made my skin so soft the next morning when I woke up. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love the feeling when I put it on at night! It's cool and has a nice scent to it. This product has helped my dry skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
My skin is pretty dull and blah in the winter but this made my skin feel soft, and bright. It smells nice and feels great. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Both my husband and I use it every night. We like how it goes on easily and a little goes a long way. Our skin feels and looks fresher. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this cream ..its all natural and so gentle on my skin. It hydrates ,moisturizes n leaves my skin refreshed and soft...i highly recommend this [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I use Lumene night cream every night before I go to bed. In the morning my skin feels very soft. I really like the way it makes my skin feel. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Got this as a free sample in exchange for a review. I'm not normally a night cream person but have really enjoyed this product. Goes on smooth and creamy without being greasy. Smells great! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

As soon as I Received my product I was anxious to try it. Absolutelylove this night cream. It goes on so smooth and my face feels great. I will be buying more [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I wanted to use this for a full week before I made a review. My skin has been extra dry due to -30 weather. After using for one full week my skin feels very smooth and hydrated. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Super easy to apply. I have never used or heard of this night cream before I tried it. I would highly recommend this to friends and family. Makes skin feel super soft and refreshed. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Used it everyday and it kept my skin smooth. Great fragrance, only have to use a little, goes along way [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I used this after I washed my face when I went to bed. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Love the way it makes my face feel. Smells great as well. As for a change not sure yet. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I really loved everything about this cream! I will definitely purchase more in the future [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This is a very creamy product and it makes my face and neck look better even after 1 application [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Great gentle cream [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product softens skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
